convexhull.datastructures

Class LinkedList

  • java.lang.Object
    • convexhull.datastructures.LinkedList

  • public class LinkedList
extends java.lang.Object
    The "container" for a doubly linked list that holds Point2D.Double objects.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LinkedList() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean contains(java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double point)
      Checks if a given point is in the linked list.
      LinkedListNode getHead()
      Returns the first node of the linked list.
      int getLength()
      Returns how many nodes are in the linked list.
      LinkedListNode getTail()
      Returns the last node of the linked list.
      void insert(java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double point)
      Adds a single Point2D.Double to the end of the linked list.
      void insertAll(LinkedList points)
      Adds all points from another linked list to this list.
      void setHead(LinkedListNode head)
      Sets a new head for the list.
      void setLength(int length)
      Setter for the length of the list if it needs to be updated manually.
      void setTail(LinkedListNode tail)
      Sets a new tail for the list.
      void sort(java.util.Comparator<java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double> comparator)
      Sorts the list using recursive merge sort.

        Parameters:
        comparator - comparator to use when sorting

      • contains

        public boolean contains(java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double point)
        Checks if a given point is in the linked list.
        Parameters:
        point - point to search for.
        Returns:
        true if point is in the list, otherwise false.
